title: Order wa Boku de Yoroshii desu ka?
original_name: オーダーは僕でよろしいですか？
sinopse:
Akari always goes to a particular coffee shop, but not for their coffee. It's to see Naruse Hijiri-kun, a waiter who's totally Akari's type. And then suddenly one day she finds him waiting outside her school? (Source: Shoujo Crusade)

Also includes:
• Haru Koi
• Power of Love
• Flying Start!
• Haru ni Kaze to Yuki ga Furu!
